thread.title: Michael - NW London
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Michael - NW London

author: Michael - NW London
title: Michael - NW London
text: Tyre goes bang Friday evening, replaced where we broke down 9am Saturday morning. Fitter was professional, polite and friendly, communication was excellent with him calling us to give us exact time of arrival. Prices were excellent, not sure you'd find cheaper and definitely not with this level of service. Happily recommend to anyone who'll listen!!!
